definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: sycomore tree (NH id., Aram. [[שִׁיקְמָא]] ,43qmo0, Löw:No.332; hence Gk, suka/hinov mulberry Lewy: Fremdw.23) ;—pl. abs. [[שִׁקְמִים]] Am 7:14 + ; sf. [[שִׁקְמוֹתָם]] Ps 78:47;—sycomore, ficus sycomorus Linn (Tristr:NHB397ff. Post:Flora of syria730; Hast. DB s.v.) a common tree Is 9:9, growing in the Shephela 1Ki 10:27 = 2Ch 1:15 = 2Ch 9:27, 1Ch 27:28; as property Ps 78:47 (‖[[גֶּפֶן ]]); [[בּוֹלֵס שִׁקְמִים]] Am 7:14 a tender of sycomores (v. [[[לַָם]]]).
